snippet.title: The Donnerwald Experiment - Chapter 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Planned release date: October 10th 2020



Get the game here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/705770/The_Donnerwald_Experiment/
Website: https://www.wegenbartho-games.com/


A new chapter is approaching the twisted tale of The Donnerwald Experiment. Johanna's about to face new adventures as well as new dangers.
There are also many new features which are NOT shown in the trailer, like the Potion Brew system, the Love Battle and the Bonus Chapter at the end.
